Since 2008, he has been working internationally in various domains including telecomunication, automotive, thermos technologies, IoT and building technologies. People find him to be a challenge taker, perfection and result orientated team player and his passion towards new languages, frameworks and methodologies allows him to be a full stack IoT developer in building cutting edge software of applications, M2M, cloud and edge computing
Recently, he find himself interested in IoT solutions where billion things are connected over various protocols and exchange information in real time, high availability and scale manners
